languages.text: {n}Трясующиеся пустотники взирают на вас с Маражаем с нескрываемым ужасом. Кто-то неудержимо плачет, кто-то неуверенно поднял убогий штык, выпиленный из какой-то арматуры, и дрожащей рукой направил его в вашу сторону — жалкая попытка убедить себя в возможности защититься от неизбежного.{/n}

{n}The quivering voidsmen stare at you and Marazhai in naked terror. One is crying uncontrollably, while another is hesitantly brandishing a pathetic bayonet fashioned from a plasteel bar, pointing it at you with a trembling hand — a pitiful attempt to convince himself that he can stave off the inevitable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Трясующиеся пустотники взирают на вас с Маражаем с нескрываемым ужасом. Кто-то неудержимо плачет, кто-то неуверенно поднял убогий штык, выпиленный из какой-то арматуры, и дрожащей рукой направил его в вашу сторону — жалкая попытка убедить себя в возможности защититься от неизбежного.{/n}

One is crying uncontrollably, while another is hesitantly brandishing a pathetic bayonet fashioned from a plasteel bar, pointing it at you with a trembling hand — a pitiful attempt to convince himself that he can stave off the inevitable.{/n}

{n}The quivering voidsmen stare at you and Marazhai in naked terror. One is crying uncontrollably, while another is hesitantly brandishing a pathetic bayonet fashioned from a plasteel bar, pointing it at you with a trembling hand — a pitiful attempt to convince himself that he can stave off the inevitable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些船员浑身颤抖，带着毫不掩饰的恐惧盯着你和玛拉斋。其中一个人正在歇斯底里地放声大哭，而另一个人正犹豫不决地挥舞着一把用塑钢做成的刺刀，用颤抖的手指着你。他绝望地试图说服自己，以为自己可以躲得过这无路可逃的死劫。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The quivering voidsmen stare at you and Marazhai in naked terror. One is crying uncontrollably, while another is hesitantly brandishing a pathetic bayonet fashioned from a plasteel bar, pointing it at you with a trembling hand — a pitiful attempt to convince himself that he can stave off the inevitable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些船员浑身颤抖，带着毫不掩饰的恐惧盯着你和玛拉斋。其中一个人正在歇斯底里地放声大哭，而另一个人正犹豫不决地挥舞着一把用塑钢做成的刺刀，用颤抖的手指着你。他绝望地试图说服自己，以为自己可以躲得过这无路可逃的死劫。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォイズマン達は震え、露骨に恐怖心を表に出し、あなたとマラズハイを見つめている。ひとりは堪えきれずに泣き叫び、もうひとりはプラスチールの棒で作ったみすぼらしい銃剣を震える手でアワアワと振り回し、こちらに向けている。避けられない事態を防いでやると自分に言い聞かせているような惨めな行為だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The quivering voidsmen stare at you and Marazhai in naked terror. One is crying uncontrollably, while another is hesitantly brandishing a pathetic bayonet fashioned from a plasteel bar, pointing it at you with a trembling hand — a pitiful attempt to convince himself that he can stave off the inevitable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォイズマン達は震え、露骨に恐怖心を表に出し、あなたとマラズハイを見つめている。ひとりは堪えきれずに泣き叫び、もうひとりはプラスチールの棒で作ったみすぼらしい銃剣を震える手でアワアワと振り回し、こちらに向けている。避けられない事態を防いでやると自分に言い聞かせているような惨めな行為だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los infantes de marina temblorosos os miran a Marazhai y a ti, presa del terror. Uno llora, inconsolable, mientras que otro blande con mano temblorosa una lamentable bayoneta improvisada a partir de una barra de plastiacero. Parece querer convencerse de que puede postergar lo inevitable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The quivering voidsmen stare at you and Marazhai in naked terror. One is crying uncontrollably, while another is hesitantly brandishing a pathetic bayonet fashioned from a plasteel bar, pointing it at you with a trembling hand — a pitiful attempt to convince himself that he can stave off the inevitable.{/n}

Parece querer convencerse de que puede postergar lo inevitable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les cosmomarins tremblants vous regardent, vous et votre comparse, sans chercher à dissimuler leur terreur. L'un d'entre eux sanglote nerveusement alors qu'un autre brandit d'une main hésitante une baïonnette de fortune, façonnée à partir d'une barre de plastacier, en une piètre tentative pour se convaincre qu'il est en mesure d'échapper à la fatalité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The quivering voidsmen stare at you and Marazhai in naked terror. One is crying uncontrollably, while another is hesitantly brandishing a pathetic bayonet fashioned from a plasteel bar, pointing it at you with a trembling hand — a pitiful attempt to convince himself that he can stave off the inevitable.{/n}

L'un d'entre eux sanglote nerveusement alors qu'un autre brandit d'une main hésitante une baïonnette de fortune, façonnée à partir d'une barre de plastacier, en une piètre tentative pour se convaincre qu'il est en mesure d'échapper à la fatalité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die zitternden Raumfahrer blicken dich und Marazhai mit nacktem Entsetzen an. Einer von ihnen weint unkontrolliert, ein anderer fuchtelt zögerlich mit einem jämmerlichen, aus Plaststahl hergerichteten Bajonett umher und richtet es mit zitternder Hand in deine Richtung – ein bemitleidenswerter Versuch, sich selbst einzureden, dass er das Unvermeidliche noch abwenden könnte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The quivering voidsmen stare at you and Marazhai in naked terror. One is crying uncontrollably, while another is hesitantly brandishing a pathetic bayonet fashioned from a plasteel bar, pointing it at you with a trembling hand — a pitiful attempt to convince himself that he can stave off the inevitable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tir tir titreyen uçsuz erleri, salt dehşet içinde sana ve Marazhai'a bakıyorlar. Biri kontrolünü kaybetmiş hâlde ağlarken diğeri, titreyen ellerinde tuttuğu plasçelik barından yapılma içler acısı bir süngüyü sana doğrultarak tereddütle savuruyor. Kaçınılmaz olanı atlatabileceğine kendini ikna etmek için acınası bir çaba sarf ediyor.{/n}
